sentences.en: Drips of water rolled down the trousers of his uniform.
sentences.cn: 他的制服裤子在不停地滴水。

sentences.en: He tried to tuck his flapping shirt inside his trousers.
sentences.cn: 他设法把飘起的衬衫塞到裤子里。

sentences.en: He was dressed in khaki trousers.
He was faultlessly attired in black coat and striped trousers.
sentences.cn: 他穿着黑色上衣和条纹裤子，简直无可挑剔。

sentences.en: He was smartly dressed in a shirt, dark trousers and boots.
sentences.cn: 他穿着衬衫和黑裤子，脚蹬皮靴，看上去很帅气。

sentences.en: He was wearing a stripy shirt and baggy blue trousers.
sentences.cn: 他身着一件条纹衬衫和一条宽松的蓝裤子。

sentences.en: He was wearing black combat trousers and a hooded fleece.
sentences.cn: 他穿着黑色作战裤和带风帽的羊毛衣。

sentences.en: He was wearing, astonishingly, a frilly pink apron over shirt and trousers.
sentences.cn: 他穿得很奇怪，衬衫和裤子外面套着件镶褶边的粉红围裙。

sentences.en: His grey jersey and trousers were sodden with the rain.
sentences.cn: 他的灰色针织毛衫和长裤全都被雨水淋透了。

sentences.en: His sodden trousers were clinging to his shins and his shoes squelched.
sentences.cn: 他湿透的裤子紧贴小腿，鞋子吧唧作响。

sentences.en: His trousers were slightly too short.
His waterproof trousers were brand new and stiff.
sentences.cn: 他那条防水裤崭新笔挺。

sentences.en: I need a new pair of trousers for work.
sentences.cn: 我需要一条上班穿的新裤子。

sentences.en: In the 1970s they all had flared trousers.
sentences.cn: 20世纪70年代的时候他们人人都有喇叭裤。

sentences.en: My hands, boots and trousers were plastered with mud.
sentences.cn: 我的双手、靴子和裤子上都沾满了泥巴。

sentences.en: The electric fire had begun to singe the bottoms of his trousers.
sentences.cn: 电暖炉的火刚开始烧着他的裤腿。

sentences.en: This month's offers include a shirt, trousers and bed covers.
sentences.cn: 本月的特价商品包括一款衬衫、裤子和多种床罩。
